## Readiness

Following set of tags are now available in the production DB:

System     |   Payload[Tag]  |   Comments
-----------|-----------------|------------
uGT        | <span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:smaller;color:green">L1TUtmTriggerMenu[_Stage2v0_hlt]</span>       | consumed
uGT RS     | <span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:smaller;color:green">L1TGlobalPrescalesVetos[_Stage2v0_hlt]</span> | validated on Run II
CALOL{1,2} | <span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:smaller;color:magenta">L1TCaloParams[_Stage2v0_hlt]</span>         | waiting on DQM at p5 to try it out
uGMT       | <span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:smaller;color:green">L1TMuonGlobalParams[_Stage2v0_hlt]</span>     | validated on few runs
BMTF       | <span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:smaller;color:green">L1TMuonBarrelParams[_Stage2v0_hlt]</span>     | validated on few runs
OMTF       | <span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:smaller;color:green">L1TMuonOverlapParams[_Stage2v0_hlt]</span>    | validated and frozen
EMTF       | <span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:smaller;color:green">L1TMuonEndCapParams[_Stage2v0_hlt]</span>     | not yet in use and not updated
EMTF PtLUT | <span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:smaller;color:grey" >L1TMuonEndCapForests[_Stage2v0_hlt]</span>    | not yet in O2O
L1T O2O    | <span style="font-weight:bold;font-size:smaller;color:blue" >L1TriggerKey(List)[_Stage2v0_hlt]</span>      | O2O internal


--- .class #id

## Miscellanea 

Prescales: validated against [monitoring tables](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/GlobalTriggerMonitoringDatabase) used for WBM:

* compared outputs from [Takashi's script](https://github.com/cms-l1-dpg/L1Menu/blob/master/scripts/getL1PrescalesRun2.py)
and my [DB viewer](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/CMSSW_8_0_X/L1TriggerConfig/Utilities/test/viewL1TGlobalPrescalesVetos.py) on ~6.5K runs of 2016

EMTF: potentially need a new CondFormats and integration with the new emulator

CaloParams: no history is available, validated on run #285832 (slides below)

Other payloads: validation via emulator vs. hardware comparison is not 100% accurate
